name: Store Memory
description: Store important information as a memory for future recall. Memories are automatically classified into sectors (semantic, episodic, procedural, emotional, reflective) and made searchable.
author: AI Stack

conversation_title.description: Optional title for context (e.g., 'Coding Preferences', 'Project Notes')

examples.prompt: Remember that I prefer Python over JavaScript for backend work
examples.call: {"content": "User prefers Python over JavaScript for backend development", "conversation_title": "Coding Preferences"}

examples.prompt: Store this: The Docker network issue was resolved by recreating the bridge
examples.call: {"content": "Docker network issue resolved by recreating the bridge", "conversation_title": "DevOps Solutions"}

examples.prompt: Note that the project deadline is December 15th
